issues.title: Add CSS to Collections Page
issues.body: Add CSS to Collections Page to design the cards and the rest of the content.

issues.title: Create Collections Page
issues.body:
Create Collections Page within pages folder:

> _pages/Collections/Collections.jsx_
> _pages/Collections/Collections.css_

issues.title: Collections Page-Render Products on the Page
issues.body:
Fetch all products on _Pages/Collections/Collections.js_ using the endpoint '/products' already created on _/server/server.js_.

**_As a user I want to be able to see all products on the page to add one in the basket_**

issues.title: Added Routes, deleted Men section from Header
issues.body: Added Routes to Collections, About, and Contact pages. At the moment we have only About page, but this should work for other pages too, once they are added

issues.title: GET products end point
issues.body:
Create inside **/server/server.js** a GET "/products" endpoint which returns all products from products table within db.
Example of a returned object within the list:

 **_{
    "id":0,
    "product_name":"White Sneakers lace up trainers",
    "product_img_url": "https://www.dv8fashion.com/Images/Models/Full/26172.Jpg",
    "initialPrice": 75,
    "discount":20
}_**

issues.title: Server Folder
issues.body:
Set up the server folder. 
> .env file with db credentials
> gitignore file for node_modules and .env
> server.js environment set up.

issues.title: Database Populate
issues.body:
Populate the database by creating a _products_ table with at least **10 products** containing the following fields:

> id

> product_name

> product_img_url

> initial_price

> discount

Search for products images (ideal for ones containing similar colours palettes).
Get inspired from shopping websites e.g. [Asos for men](https://www.asos.com/search/?q=sneakers&refine=floor:1001,2001) to collect productName or productImg data.

issues.title: Create Database on Render
issues.body: Create a db on render and provide the link to be used further.

issues.title: Back-end Part
issues.body:
Create the back-end part so you can fetch the data from an API for:

- render the products on Collections Page
- query for filters on the Collections Page

issues.title: Filters Added for collections page
issues.body:
Add filters on to the collections page. 
Find an example below:


![Image](https://github.com/LorenaCapraru/g1-e-commerce-app/assets/108892538/6cb20d2f-ec0d-4ec2-b517-8e744041d7c7)

issues.title: Collections Page
issues.body:
A collection page must be created where it renders all the products available in the stock with their details like:
- product name
- product picture
- product price
- discounted price if existed

**Suggestion**:
The page could display 3 cards based on some categories:
- basics
- new in the stock
- popular
 And after clicking to render the products.

issues.title: Checkout Page
issues.body:
A view your basket link should redirect to Checkout Page where you can see all products added to the basket.
Features:
- renders all products added in the cart by the user
- displays number of items added for each product
- can increase or decrease number of items per product
- can delete product from basket

issues.title: About Page
issues.body: Create an about page which includes a short description about the business and services provided. You have the freedom of designing at your own pace just stick to the colours, sizes, font-family used by now.

issues.title: Products json
issues.body:
Create a json file which includes products details in below format:
```
{
    "id":0,
    "productName":"White Sneakers lace up trainers",
    "productImg": "../images/product1.png",
    "initialPrice": 75,
    "discount":20
}
```

- Create at least 20 objects
- Search for products images (ideal for ones containing similar colours palettes) and add them inside images folder
- Get inspired from shopping websites e.g. [Asos for men](https://www.asos.com/search/?q=sneakers&refine=floor:1001,2001) to collect productName or productImg data.
- Place the file inside server folder. If there's no server folder, create it.

issues.title: Contact Page
issues.body:
Create a contact page which includes a contact form to collect data from customers. 
- full name
- contact number
- email address
- comment section
Please be sure you provide form validation, hence to make appropriate fields mandatory and also constraints for input format( e.g. email address format).
Try to stick to the css style from home page.
Also include details about company, like: social media links, physical address

issues.title: Responsiveness and CSS Adjustments
issues.body:
Styling needs fixing for both **desktop and mobile** versions. Some notes are made on, but feel free to explore:

- > Cart positioning/shadow/transition 
- > Photo slider and Description wrap in a div to control position.
- > Photo slider : fixing picture maximising/pictures border
- > Header : menu hover function changed to mid-to-bottom underline
- > Hamburger menu positioning when scroll.

issues.title: Move Cart to Header
issues.body: Cart must be moved to Header and Header style update.

issues.title: Readme.md file
Linting
issues.body:
This task is for the end of the project. 
Before its declared done, it must be checked for proper linting.

issues.title: Responsiveness
issues.body:
The website is build on mobile-first approach. 
Therefore 2 more breakpoints needed added for all pages:

> **media query for tablet** `@media screen and (min-width: 540px) `

> **media query for desktop** `@media screen and (min-width: 900px) `
### **Also check images**


![Image](https://github.com/LorenaCapraru/g1-e-commerce-app/assets/108892538/b9baf7eb-16e5-400b-bb15-969286c06d00)
![Image](https://github.com/LorenaCapraru/g1-e-commerce-app/assets/108892538/0e055334-cc0f-4158-99af-f5f0cfa8c9d0)
